2132.subject: NURS
2132.descrlong: The course emphasizes models and methods for delivering health care in a post health care reform environment and includes an exploration of the multiple relationships between interdisciplinary healthcare team members, the central role of the nurse in care coordination, the presence of an authoritarian hierarchy, and gender effects in nursing. Using data-based studies and policy analysis the important but invisible sociopolitical environment in which the work of nursing is performed is discussed.

2153.subject: NURS
2153.descrlong:
The course emphasizes models and methods for delivering health care in a post health care reform environment and includes an exploration of the multiple relationships between interdisciplinary healthcare team members, the central role of the nurse in care coordination, the presence of an authoritarian hierarchy, and gender effects in nursing. Using data-based studies and policy analysis the important but invisible sociopolitical environment in which the work of nursing is performed is discussed.

(Restricted to NURS Majors Only)

2154.subject: NURS
2154.descrlong:
Discusses the current issues and advancements in professional nursing. Explorations of historical nursing milestones are compared with progressive present practice. The work of nursing is examined as performed within the sociopolitical context.

(Restricted to NURS Majors Only)
